tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB when)) (S (NP (NP (DT the) (NN person)) (SBAR (S (NP (PRP you)) (VP (VBP like))))) (VP (VBZ has) (NP (EX there))))) (NP (NN friend)) (VP (VBP yell) (PP (IN at) (NP (PRP you))) (PP (IN for) (NP (PRP them)))) (. .)))
